title: Pokemon Quiz - First generation v1.2.1 Android
description:
Quiz (trivia) based on the popular game and anime series PoKÃƒÂ©MoN. Questions of various difficulty will allow you to fill knowledge gaps about the series, as well as provide much entertainment. Check your knowledge of PoKÃƒÂ©MoN! For now quiz questions concern ONLY elements from first generation and were written in English! 


Features:
- Over 150 questions!
- 3 game modes - Classic, Sudden Death and Time Challenge!
- Score depends on the time and number of correct answers - Who of your friends will earn the most points?
- Plenty of configuration options!
- "Submit question" option - you can send a questions, that after moderation, may appear in game!
- Completely free!
- And much, much more...

Game modes:
- In Classic mode user answers 15 questions. The wrong answer does not interrupt the game.
- In Sudden Death mode user answers 20 questions, but when user selects a wrong answer loses.
- In Time Challenge mode user answers 20 questions. Response time for ALL questions is limited (correct answer adds some extra time) and if it runs out user loses. The wrong answer does not interrupt the game.

This is an unofficial app. Not affiliated with Nintendo.
